title: An apologie, or defence, of those Englishe writers [and] preachers which Cerberus the three headed dog of hell, chargeth wyth false doctrine, vnder the name of predestination. Written by Robert Crowley clerke, and vicare of Sainct Giles without Creple-gate in London
author: Crowley, Robert, 1518?-1588.
publicationStmtPublisher: In Paternoster Rowe, at the signe of the blacke boy, by [H. Denham for] Henry Binneman,
